item.title: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

DirectX… Lemme see…

It says it’s a Shockwave 3D game.

Here, I’ll let you check.

This is the link:

http://www.neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=356

And if you don’t have an account on Neopets (you need one to play the game), you may use the one I pm you. Just post here for the Username and Password

Read full topic
item.source: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Is the game you’re using a DirectX game? Because Scar will not work with DirectX.

SRL = Scar Resource Library, it’s essentially a huge library of procedures and functions for RuneScape to help other scripters out.

Read full topic

item.title: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Don’t use the chr(), use the first script that you posted, it compiles fine.

Here, I’ll just repost it:

program New; begin KeyDown(38); KeyDown(38); KeyDown(38); KeyDown(38); KeyDown(38); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(38); KeyDown(38); KeyDown(38); KeyDown(37); KeyDown(37); KeyDown(40); KeyDown(39); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(38); KeyUp(37); KeyUp(37); KeyUp(40); KeyUp(39); end.

Read full topic
item.source: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

Sure.

program DiceEscape;
begin
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(38));
KeyDown(chr(37));
KeyDown(chr(37));
KeyDown(chr(40));
KeyDown(chr(39));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(38));
KeyUp(chr(37));
KeyUp(chr(37));
KeyUp(chr(40));
KeyUp(chr(39));
end.

And this error message:

Line 3: [Error] (3:12): open round (’(’)expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\DEsc.scar

item.title: Dice Escape- What am I doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

program New;
begin
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(38);
KeyDown(37);
KeyDown(37);
KeyDown(40);
KeyDown(39);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(38);
KeyUp(37);
KeyUp(37);
KeyUp(40);
KeyUp(39);
end.

======

I have that so far. I wanna make one for every level eventually (just a lot of keypresses), but I can’t seem to get it working.

Some help please?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 04:02:42 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind, just realized that I have to put it like this: KeyDown(‘38’);

But I’ve run into a different problem…

“Line 3: [Error] (3:14): Type mismatch in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03ScriptsDEsc.scar”

Now some help?
